thread.title: 0% fee hike: Students react with tears and jubiliation
thread.title_full: 0% fee hike: Students react with tears and jubiliation | News24

author: news24.com
title: 0% fee hike: Students react with tears and jubiliation
text:
Cape Town - Students have reacted with tears and jubilation as news spread that President Jacob Zuma had agreed to a zero percent increase on student fees.
News24 reporter Jenni Evans said there were cheers outside Parliament where students had gathered.
Evans said motorists hooted and gave students a thumbs up, while some of the students started singing the national anthem.
"We got what we were asking for," said one student, adding that it had been very emotional to see their fellow students arrested.
